text: Gu guigira khueŋ khothɨga havhargiap khaŋ suaŋgi, gu fharav zɨv nde gangip, nde thav Masedonia ŋgu bakɨme fhain ŋgɨrga. Gu Masedonia ŋgu bakɨme fhain kegɨp, gu ana thav, gu taagip nden han zɨrga. Gu mba tɨvar muuŋgirga, Fhe Bakɨme wom phena tɨtɨgɨp tɨvar vhuun nde muunga. Nde vhɨra nan kurarim, gu Zudia ŋgu bakɨme fhain ŋgɨrga.
